channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023091049
item.description:
Report X-2023091049

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: SEEKONK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found leaking. Placed into spill bin and brought to QA cage for further processing. DescribePack: Lid loosened causing sodium hypochlorite pellets to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed into spill bin to prevent further movement or spillage of contents.

item.title: Report E-2023100643
item.description:
Report E-2023100643

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-26T15:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: When picking up a pallet of drums with a forklift, a nail on in the pallet popped and slightly punctured a drum contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was neutralized and cleaned up with absorbents and placed into a recovery drum as was the damaged pail after it was repaired with drum putty.

item.title: Report E-2023100553
item.description:
Report E-2023100553

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of pre-mixed fuel (un1203) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the inner metal 3.2 liter can had released 1 cup of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup of the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
